  • Mettez le mÃ©lange prÃ©parÃ© de beurre, de sucre et de sel dans une poÃªle chaude sur la cuisiniÃ¨re. Remuez le mÃ©lange jusquâ€™Ã  ce quâ€™il fonde.
  • Mettez la plaque dâ€™amandes cuites dans la poÃªle, remuez rapidement et uniformÃ©ment jusquâ€™Ã  ce que le mÃ©lange ait un certain collant, puis Ã©teignez le feu.
  • Astuce : comme les amandes sont dÃ©jÃ  cuites et que les Ã©pices sont trÃ¨s inflammables, nous devons garder le feu doux.
  • Ã‰talez uniformÃ©ment le mÃ©lange dâ€™amandes assaisonnÃ©es sur un grand plateau afin quâ€™aucune des amandes ne colle ensemble.
  • Attendez 2 minutes, tapotez doucement le plateau avec une spatule pour sÃ©parer les amandes du plateau.

Ã‰tape #3 : DÃ©gustez des amandes caramÃ©lisÃ©es

  • Les amandes elles-mÃªmes ont un goÃ»t gras, on peut donc dÃ©guster ces amandes beurrÃ©es seules ou avec du yaourt, avec du fromage frais ou avec des fruits (avocat, bananeâ€¦)

Pâ€™tites notes :

  • Dâ€™aprÃ¨s les scientifiques, les amandes ont un contenu nutritionnel trÃ¨s Ã©levÃ©, il est conseillÃ© de manger 15-25 amandes par jour.
  • On peut aussi faire plusieurs lots dâ€™amandes en mÃªme temps, chaque lot de 200â€“300g et les mettre dans un bocal dans un endroit frais et sec.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Et voilÃ  mon expÃ©rience personnelle sur la faÃ§on de faire de dÃ©licieuses amandes croustillantes et caramÃ©lisÃ©es que toute ma famille aime grignoter chaque aprÃ¨s-midi. Jâ€™espÃ¨re que vous le trouverez utile. Ã€ bientÃ´t pour dâ€™autres recettes !

item.title: HOME-MADE CARAMELIZED ALMONDS RECIPE
item.dc:creator: Lan Anh
item.description: Almonds are a nut rich in vitamin E, antioxidants, brain-healthy unsaturated fats and many other minerals. In this article, I will share how to make buttery, crispy, caramelized almonds without artificial additives and preservatives. This can be a nutritious snack for the whole family or…
item.content:encoded:
Almonds are a nut rich in vitamin E, antioxidants, brain-healthy unsaturated fats and many other minerals. In this article, I will share how to make buttery, crispy, caramelized almonds without artificial additives and preservatives. This can be a nutritious snack for the whole family or a treat for guests.

INGREDIENTS:

  • 300g unpeeled almonds
  • 50g unsalted butter
  • 50g sugar
  • 1 teaspoon salt

DIRECTIONS:

Step #1: Fry or roast the almonds

  • Put the almonds in a hot pan, keep the heat on medium low and stir constantly so that the almonds are cooked evenly, without burning the edges.
  • Tip: Frying almonds is like frying peanuts. When we hear the crackling sound, the almonds have begun to be cooked. At this point, we turn off the heat but continue to stir for another 3 minutes so that the innermost part of the almonds is completely cooked.
  • Pour the fried/ roasted almonds onto a plate.

Step #2: Mix fried almonds with spices

  • Put the prepared mixture of butter, sugar, and salt in a hot pan. Stir the mixture until it melts.
  • Put the fried almonds in the pan, stir quickly and evenly until the mixture has a certain stickiness, then turn off the heat.
  • Tip: because the almonds are already cooked and the spices are very flammable, we need to keep the heat low.
  • Spread the seasoned almond mixture evenly on a large tray so that none of the almonds stick together.
  • Wait 2 minutes, gently tap the tray with a spatula to separate the almonds from the tray.

Step #3: Enjoy caramelized almonds

  • The candied almonds themselves have a sweet and fatty taste, so we can enjoy these buttered almonds only or with yogurt, with fresh cheese or with fruits (avocado, bananaâ€¦)

Small notes:

  • According to scientists, almonds contain a very high nutritional content, itâ€™s advisable to eat 15â€“25 almonds every day.
  • We can also roast several batches of almonds at the same time, each batch of 200â€“300g and put them in a jar in a cool and dry place.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Well, this is my personal experience on how to make delicious, crispy, caramelized almonds that my whole family loves to snack with every afternoon. Hope you find it useful. See you soon with other recipes!
